tool_description: Analyzes job posting performance data to provide insights and optimization recommendations for future postings.

performance_data.description: JSON string containing performance metrics from application tracker

posting_details.description: JSON string containing original posting details and configuration

benchmark_data.description: Whether to compare against industry benchmarks

error_messages: Invalid performance data: Performance data must be valid JSON format.
Invalid posting details: Posting details must be valid JSON format.
Insufficient data: Not enough performance data available for meaningful analysis.
Invalid analysis depth: Must be one of [basic, detailed, comprehensive].
usage: Provide performance metrics and original posting details as JSON strings. Choose whether to include benchmark comparisons and set analysis depth for comprehensive insights.

key_insights.description: Top insights and findings from the analysis

optimization_recommendations.description: Specific recommendations for improving future postings

platform_effectiveness.description: Effectiveness ranking of each platform used

roi_analysis.description: Return on investment analysis for the posting campaign
